entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Invalid cached console cursor position on Unix #77995
  • RegexCharClass.CanMerge inhibits optimization based on previous optimization #77994
    Future
  • Enhance the retry after of System.Threading.RateLimiting #77991
  • TLS Handshake error: `Win32Exception: The message received was unexpected or badly formatted` #77989
  • Could not load file or assembly System.Text.Json Version=7.0.0.0,or one of its dependencies. The located assembly's manifest definition does not match the assembly reference. (Exception from HRESULT: 0x80131040) #77988
  • Expose data protection keychains through X509Store #77986
  • Handle returned GetMainProgramHandle() not sufficient for resolving statically linked native symbols on iOS #77985
  • [gcstress0x3-gcsttress0xc] Interop/COM/ComWrappers/WeakReference/WeakReferenceTest/WeakReferenceTest fails #77976
  • [jitstress-random] Assertion failed '((lclNode->gtFlags & GTF_VAR_DEF) != 0) && (((lclNode->gtFlags & GTF_VAR_USEASG) != 0) == !isFullDef)' #77975
  • Simplify Microsoft.Win32.Registry sources split #77974
    Future
  • AccessViolation when calling rejitted method #77973
  • Recursive assembly spec parsing with textual PGO #77971
  • [API Proposal]: Add Length and IsEmpty properties to System.BinaryData #77970
  • Perf-trap with `IBinaryInteger<T>.WriteLittleEndian` #77969
  • [libraries-pgo] Assert failure: Reached the "unreachable" in getArrayOrStringLength #77968
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] `DebuggerRootHidden` elements cannot have identical names #77965
  • UDP socket cannot be disconnected with Connect(IPAddress.Any, 0) #77962
  • OutOfMemoryException in container that didn't have enough memory to allocate an LOH segment #77961
  • Test failure baseservices/threading/regressions/beta2/437017/437017.sh #77960
  • [API Proposal]: MemoryExtensions.IndexOfAny{Except}WhiteSpace #77959
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Reflection Invoke crashing on methods with ref void* arguments #73100
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'unused->OperIs(GT_CNS_INT)' #77152
    8.0.0
  • [Question] [Android] Crash due to crypto asserts #77258
  • add support for abstract namespaces in Unix domain sockets #77931
  • [Possible bug]: Custom setter being up to 40 times slower than directly setting a field's value #77964
  • Consolidate IndexOf variations into helper in regex source generator and compiler #77905
    8.0.0
  • Implementations of Double.ExpM1, Double.LogP1 & co are not correct for arguments close to 0 #77979
  • Test failure GC/LargeMemory/Regressions/largearraytest/largearraytest.sh #77477
  • [.NET 8] Mono workload doesn't import Microsoft.NET.Runtime.MonoAOTCompiler.Task #77385
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!"Should not see phi nodes after rationalize"' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #77886
    8.0.0
  • ILCompiler failed to ASP.NET WebApplication for ARM64 AOT, with 'System.Net.Quic' #77966
  • [NativeAOT] Document steps for consuming static libraries #77951

PullRequests

Created

  • Cleanup unmaintainable parallel logic with workers #77993
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • Enhance the retry after of System.Threading.RateLimiting #77992
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Add a VN-based dead store removal phase #77990
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Stop keeping resolved deps around for app lifetime #77987
    area-Host, 8.0.0
  • Add linker to area owners #77983
    area-Meta
  • JIT: Fix GenTreeCall::Equals for virtual vs static calls #77981
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Be more precise about choosing what to DNER in block morphing #77980
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove .NET 6 Console Key Parser #77977
    area-System.Console, 8.0.0
  • Pass NodeFactory to ObjectData's Section #77967
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Merged

  • Add readmes for configuration packages, part 2 #77982
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Allow deleting any kind of nodes after address mode formation #77872
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Pass TargetRid and SourceBuildNonPortable to the native scripts (backport of #74504) #77508
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Define __cpuid{ex} only when there's no builtin one (backport of #73065) #77507
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix process aborts when using cryptographic primitives with empty input for Android #77283
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 6.0.12
  • Fix StreamReader EOF handling and improve perf #69888
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Managed EventSources do not show up by default in EventPipe sessions (#75248) #77811
    Servicing-approved, EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.1
  • Refactor ProcessStartInfoTests to use WindowsTestAccount #77804
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, test-enhancement, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Revert "Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion" #77899
  • check the right return value for mmap #77952
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix typo in docs of AdvSimd.Arm64.TransposeOdd #76971
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Improve IndexOf handling in regex source generator / compiler #77925
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Add and use a MakeSrcRegOptional that validates IsSafeToContainMem was called #77895
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove unnecessary encoding allocations in System.Private.DataContractSerialization #76366
    area-Serialization

Updated

  • Introduce WASM JITs for interpreter opcodes, do_jit_call, and interp_entry wrappers #76477
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Clean-up `Microsoft.Win32.Registry` and remove the non-Windows code. #77996
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Add AVX-512 testing pipeline #77930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement AES-GCM with CryptoKit on macOS #76490
    area-System.Security, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Fix the build with BACKGROUND_GC turned off #77328
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add Readme.md for Resources, Threading.Tasks, Threading.Channels, ComilerServices, Configuration and CodeDom assemblies #77932
    area-Meta
  • [JIT] - Fixed sub-optimal optimization for `a % 1` to Zero #77760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Updating CreateScalar to be intrinsic for Vector64/128/256 #77798
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Sync linker to NativeAOT #77894
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix Configuration with IList and ICollection #77857
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Add ability for crossgen2 to synthesize PGO histograms #77683
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Vectorize String.Equals for OrdinalIgnoreCase #77947
    area-System.Globalization
  • Move the `[With|Get]Element(SIMD)` folding to local morph #76491
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • DNER multi-reg locals early if they cannot be enregistered #77943
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] source-build: support building runtime using non-portable runtime packages (backport of #75597) #77509
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix KeepNativeSymbols to work on mono as well (backport of #66594) #77506
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, 6.0.12
  • [release/6.0] Fix gcc warnings during mono linux-x64 build (backport of #60675) #77505
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Improve coreclr test infra #77929
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #75054
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution
  • MemoryExtensions.Replace(Span<T>, T, T) implemented #76337
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix sprintf deprecation error with Xcode 14.1 #77950
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Hardware intrinsics tests in new style #74886
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, test-enhancement
  • avoid alpn allocation on windows #74619
    area-System.Net.Security, os-windows, 8.0.0
  • [mono] MiniJIT OP_XEQUAL for floats #77770
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [JIT] X64 - Minor optimizations for arithmetic and `not` / `neg` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change regMask_enum and regMaskTP to unsigned __int64_t on AMD64. #77571
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Optimize (WasmRoot|WasmExternalRoot).clear #77521
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Linker into runtime diff #77569
    NO-MERGE, area-Tools-linker
  • [corlib] Move System.Reflection.Emit.SignatureHelper to the shared partition #77939
    area-System.Reflection
  • Add simple Else conditions to If Conversion #77728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add XxHash128 #77944
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Use Environment.IsPrivilegedProcess #77847
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add intrinsics for clz and ctz instructions #77777
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • New ASCII APIs #75012
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Adding new ReadyToRun helper for static cctor #76898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Update repository URL in package.json #77937
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix CngKey.KeySize for keys in the Platform Crypto Provider #77809
    area-System.Security
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
  • [release/7.0] [ppc64le] Implementation of mono_arch_get_delegate_virtual_invoke_impl method for ppc64le architecture #77788
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Correct minimum memory size value from 200MB to 20MB #77787
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • WIP: Clean near unmaintainable parallel logic 53593 #76949
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • [mono] Added null-checks for LDFLDA on pointers. #77827
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • unify error handling for FileStream and Pipe Streams #77543
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • Fix relative symlink support in TarFile #77338
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Implement Console.SetWindowSize() for linux #75824
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Suppress warnings for deprecated keychain APIs #77926
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, os-mac-os-x, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Suppress warnings for deprecated keychain APIs #77924
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, os-mac-os-x, 7.0.x
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix DebuggerTypeProxy for structs and for classes with multiple constructors #77039
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C: SetMessageSendPendingException and SetMessageSendCallback #77956
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Small cleanups #77954
    area-Build-mono
  • add 0x63 status code #74780
    blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Add support for dehydrated runtime data structures #77884
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Allocate boxed static structs on Frozen Object Heap #77737
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Slightly relax "const vector propagation" heuristics #76788
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Extend ProcessStartInfo to allow setting LOGON_NETCREDENTIALS_ONLY #77637
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-07
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM]: GT_STORE_OBJ implementation #1757

PullRequests

Created

  • Filament/prolog debug #2069
  • More stackwalking fixes #2068
  • Fix a few things regarding EC, await, and thread pool local queuing #2067

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Turn on optimisation in RyuJit module, partial support for FIELD_LIST and lowering promoted fields #2007

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Warn when publishing in Debug configuration #28927
  • running on macOS Monterey, Apple M1 Mac, extremely slow, and generating multiples dotnet processes #28925
  • RID aware .NET tools #28923
  • Templates for `struct`, `enum`, `record` #28915

Closed

  • restore want load through api.nuget.org except local mirorr #28926
  • Enable publishing a self-contained app with `PublishSelfContained` #26445
  • Enable publishing for a RID with `PublishRuntimeIdentifier` #26444
  • [Megathread] Engineering Status of RID Improvements and Publish UX Changes #26503

PullRequests

Created

  • Update ApiCompat entries in CODEOWNERS file #28919
  • Add diagnostic id docs link to suppression file #28918
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Upgrade the verbosity of error headers #28917
    Area-ApiCompat

Merged

  • removed `v` prefix from `dotnetcli` host version #28776
    Area-dotnet new

Updated

  • Update the sdk build to target net8.0 #28563
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add RidSpecific, Make Apps RID Specific By Default & RID Now FDD By Default in 8.0+ #28412
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support calling unique launch profiles with a case-insensitive nature & Improve errors around launch profiles #28908
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add PackageDependenciesDesignTime to cache assets file #28405
  • Introduce a class library Microsoft.DotNet.ApiSymbolExtensions #28855
    Area-GenAPI
  • Make PublishAot an optional feature because Mono does not support it. #28674
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx] ResolveReadyToRunCompilers: map non-portable rids when targetOS is determined (backport #28380) #28782
    Servicing-consider, Area-ReadyToRun
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2038777 #28914
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28904
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28907
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #28909
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-07
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Bug] Enum flags - with syntax in record types not allowing to add #6664
  • Exception Coalescence #6663

Updated

  • [Proposal]: `Task<T>` nullability covariance #3950
    Working Set
  • [API Proposal]: stackalloc inside ref struct #6631

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add notes from params improvements working group meeting 2022-11-03 #6657

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Change TypedReference to standard ref struct semantics + support __makeref(ref struct) #65255
    C# 12.0

Closed

  • Offer more autocomplete options when accessibility modifiers don't match. #64821
    Backlog
  • Core Editing: IntelliSense is fighting me when I type things that don't exist yet #10279
    Backlog
  • Roslyn falls back to use VB glyphs if the language is not C# in GoToDefinitionService results #15178
    Backlog
  • System.Collections.Immutable > 1.1.37 is evil #15559
  • Annotated C# Language Specification #16687
  • CodeAnalysis.Elfie unlisted on Nuget #17984
  • FindReferencesAsync returns nothing for extension in static class #20243
    Backlog
  • Diagnostic just randomly disappears; VisualStudio crashes when debugging it to figure out why #20429
    Backlog
  • AbstractProject.AddAnalyzerReference allocates 2.5% of opening ProjectSystem.sln #20663
    Backlog
  • Extract interface needs to copy along #nullable context #37177
    Backlog
  • Test plan for UnsignedRightShift feature #60433
    17.4
  • ExternAliases4 test throws if `GetEmitDiagnostics` call added #60045
    Compiler.Next
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33107.97 #65257
  • Adding semicolon inbetween property name and { get; set; } invalidates rest of the document (excess errors) #52
    Backlog
  • F1 on `default` in generic constraints takes to wrong documentation #65210
    17.5
  • Caller-Information-like Attribute to inspect nullability of generic type parameter values at runtime #64755

PullRequests

Created

  • Move hover down to LSP layer from editor layer #65264
    Area-IDE
  • Move rename down to LSP layer from editor layer. #65263
    Area-IDE
  • Refine error recovery in the parser around top level statements #65262
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove ImportCompletion feature flag and enable by default #65259
    Area-IDE
  • Parser semicolon in intializer expression error handling #65256
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix delegate inference for `using static` methods #65253
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements

Merged

  • Move LSP symbol handlers down from Editor layer to LanguageServerProtocol layer #65258
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move find-all-refs LSP handler down to LSP layer from editor layer. #65261
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Allow users to specify only partial accessibility in override completion #65248
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65260
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Cache translated imports in PEModuleBuilder #65215
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65250
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Improve parser error recovery around misplaced semicolon #65089
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add F1 help keyword for `default` constraint #65229
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #65246
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65265
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Generalize error message for CS1997 #65231
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Incremental generator nodes must run when no result history #65223
    Area-Compilers
  • Re-enable navigate-to streaming with IAsyncEnumerable. #65244
    Area-IDE
  • Re-enable all streaming services. #65241
    Area-IDE
  • Improve `NormalizeWhitespace` for object initializers #65249
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Removed "sealed" from base class #64983
    Area-IDE
  • Fix ArgumentNullException under a race condition in analyzer driver #65083
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Allow 'initialize property' to recognize simple throwing properties. #65235
    Area-IDE
  • Enhance rule metadata and suppression info in SARIF V2 errorlog #64277
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Add lambda defaults/`params` conversion warnings #64961
    Area-Compilers
  • Add more lambda defaults/`params` tests #65214
    Area-Compilers
  • Is pattern expression with in parameter avoid unnecesary temp in rewriter #65243
    Area-Compilers, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor JS Interop is bugged in an hard to reproduce scenario. #44927
  • Slow perf regression #44926
  • Perf regression: json, json, plaintext_actix #44924
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, plaintext #44923
  • API for dispatching to renderer sync context and capturing exceptions #44920
  • Unfixable warning CS8669 in RCL components #44919
  • Blazor server .net template not work on ios safari #44914
  • JSInterop does not support nullable struct #44922
  • GeneratePackageOnBuild with TypeScript throws error #44911

Closed

  • NavigationOption: ScrollAfterNavigation:false => Prevents scroll after navigation #36605
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Update to Bootstrap v5.2 #42025
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, https, plainTextWithFilter #44063
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, updates #44339
  • Perf regression: fortunes_actix, https, mvc #43805
  • Perf regression: json #44905
  • Blazor - Binding Blazor Component or workaround [ask from WPF guy] #44897
  • Unable to write Integration Tests for Blazor Webassembly (deps.json is missing) #44909
  • Error handling from non-Blazor events (e.g. Timer) #44871
  • A question about closures and render fragments. #44867
  • Accessing `CascadingValue` from component rendered inside `SectionOutlet` #44912
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException in ValueTaskSourceAsTask #37189
    8.0-MQ
  • Web.config property not working with iOS 16.0+ #44908
  • Perf improvement: updates #44904

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump SDK to 8.0.100-alpha.1.22556.1 #44925
    area-infrastructure
  • Change X-Requested-With header to "Fetch" in FetchHttpClient #44921
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `3026483` to `a4f02ef` #44916
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `c824ca9` to `57bf5a0` #44915
    area-infrastructure
  • refactor(NavLink): render aria-current attribute #44913
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix typo in NavigateToLogin doc comments #43933
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/2.1] Remove VS feeds #44876
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • HttpSys request header dictionary does not remove headers when Remove() is called #44860
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update selenium dependency versions #44834
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2039074 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] Remove feeds, add to SiteExtension bundle #44882
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-07
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Guidance on using PerfView/other perf visualization tools. #2911
    7.0.0
  • Add docs to better describe the .NET diagnostic experience #515
    7.0.0
  • E2E guide how to collect a dump and debug it with VS or LLDB #2903
    7.0.0
  • Diagnosing managed memory leaks with dotnet-gcdump. #2905
    7.0.0
  • dumpasync --methodtable result in error when parameter are not prefix with the 0x (hex) sign #3137
    8.0.0
  • Improve distributed tracing doc #3451
    8.0.0
  • dotnet-dump "mini" dumps do not include enough data to debug managed process dumps #3065
    Future
  • A few SOS commands fail on a Linux single-file app under lldb at process launch #3265
    8.0.0
  • Please offer native version for macOS Arm64 #3494
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [Dotnet Monitor] Add Metadata Support For `CounterPayload` #3498
  • BackgroundGC check #3497

Updated

  • Add service manager and reflection based service discovery #3448

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.Maui.Platform.HandlerNotFoundException: 'Handler not found for view Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Maps.Map.' #11169
  • Clicked event don't fire inside of Shell.TitleView in IOS #11168
  • Error MAUI0000 - System.Xml.XmlException #11167
  • Xamarin Maui Entry cursor movent in iOS cores Simulator #11165
  • more than one collectionview doesn't work in visual studio for mac #11164
  • .Net Maui ImageButton Problem #11163
  • Major change in Grids in latest .NET MAUI Preview #11162
  • MAUI Handler Require VS Cleaning #11161
  • MauiSplashScreen resizetizering issue #11160
  • Android MauiIcon resizetizering issue #11159
  • DVTItunesSoftwareServiceFoundation error deploying to iOS device #11158
  • [Android] ScrollView accessibility is broken #11157
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • .Net Maui iOS 15.4 app won't build using Asp.net 6.0.400, Visual Studio 17.3.6 & Xamarin SDK 17.3.0.308 #11156
  • [iOS] Entry in Border - strange corner round. #11152
  • Shell.TabBarIsVisible="False" is ignored #11151
    Backlog
  • Setting UserDataFolder on BlazorWebViewInitializingEventArgs in Blazor WPF application does not work #11144
    Backlog
  • Unable to access raw json asset file. #11143
    Backlog
  • Can't specify the color of an SVG image #11141
  • [iOS][MacCatalyst] Grid layout calls Measure on its children way too many times #11140
    Backlog
  • Android version code incorrect when publishing release build apk #11139
    Backlog
  • Nested Stacklayouts inner Stacklayout only renders height of first element (.NET 7.0) #11137
    Backlog

Closed

  • \obj\project.assets.json' doesn't have a target for 'net6.0-windows10.0.19041.0'. Ensure that restore has run and that you have included 'net6.0-windows10.0.19041.0' in the TargetFrameworks for your project. #10984
  • Serious issue with Dotnet MAUI iOS -- > Bitcode is deprecated when publishing app to appstore #10989
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Android Designer for Visual Studio doesn't load custom components #11112
  • Create selection not present, but also apparently unnecessary #7579
  • Error: System Image folder in config.ini doesn't exist #7578
  • Unable to convert Microsoft.Maui.Handlers.LayoutHandler to UIKit.UIView #10918

PullRequests

Created

  • [DevOps] Rename the xamarin-templates resource to yaml-templates. #11166
    community ✨
  • Ignore Authenticate Reunion NuGet sources - net7 #11150
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Notify Button ImageSource changes correctly #11146
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Extract Maps, Graphics & Foldable docs during build (#10909) #11142
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • Consolidate handlertestbase #11021
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Ignore Authenticate Reunion NuGet sources #11145
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Extract Maps, Graphics & Foldable docs during build #10909
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Run dotnet format on Build.Tasks.slnf #11108
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

    t/bug, area/navigation 🧭, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [Tizen] Add Label TextType #11103

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Creating a bundle fails due to missing 'libhostpolicy.dylib' library on M1 Mac and Windows #29495
  • ManyToMany not working if the joint entity is explicitly set #29493
  • Migrations Bundle fails with Blazor sln #29491

Closed

  • type RuntimeEntityType throws InvalidOperationException during IsTableExcludedFromMigrations #29490
  • why there is no SqliteDateDiffFunctionsTranslator #29471
  • #EF Core 6.0.10 EntityTypeConfiguration seting class can't binds DataBase Table #29454
  • DBFunction Cast bug #29441
  • AsSplitQuery checks ids, what causes missing data. #29430
  • InvalidOperationException: Cannot save changes for an entity in state 'Unchanged' #29472
  • Using Postgres mapped enum as type discriminator causes re-creation of records in migrations #29461
  • Select{Count(field)} translation error #29408

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix to #17066 - Query: Translate ElementAt(OrDefault) #29496

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #29494
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • Add support for Global Query Filters on derived types. #27978
    propose-close, waiting-for-response
  • Don't duplicate query filter parameters #29422

entry.content:

Created

PullRequests

  • Use ".NET" in preference to ".NET Core" #14902
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Eliminate runtime portable build #14816
  • Get the telemetry version from the --version command and use it to fi… #14899
